Text: I tried to upload an image to show you all what it looks like, but a Google search will most likely help. Please seed, this is such a small file!

Ah, yes, GEOS. I had GEOS 2 on the Commodore C64 and it was great, in fact it was far better than Windows 3.1 in my opinion. It's too bad that Microsoft's monopolistic practices wiped out GEOS and GEM, both of which had some really nice features, and were (contrary to what the Windows fanbois claim) quite competitive.
